abstract: Barclays moved to restore its reputation by overhauling its culture. We explained the trouble with closed-end mutual funds that invest in start-ups and provided analysis of a deal that helped one of the nation’s bigger regional banks catch up in capital. A look back on our reporting of last week’s highs and lows in finance.
snippet: Barclays moved to restore its reputation by overhauling its culture. We explained the trouble with closed-end mutual funds that invest in start-ups and provided analysis of a deal that helped one of the nation’s bigger regional banks catch up in c...
lead_paragraph: Barclays is moving to restore its reputation by overhauling its culture. We explained the trouble with closed-end mutual funds that invest in start-ups and provided analysis of a deal that helped one of the nation’s bigger regional banks catch up in capital.

headline.main: Week in Review: Tracking Deal Makers Outside of Tampa
